Reviews.Title: “Who Do I Contact”
Reviews.Author: Sheila D
Reviews.Content: I have looked for a contact number other then the hotel and have not found one. I have never been so disqusted with a room in my life. I am attaching a photo of just the bathtub they thought I would shower in... I have many complaints and would like to know who to contact.. all the extra charges above what was quoted me... I was to get a beachside, courtside room... they had me in a room facing the parking lot... I was charged another 28 dollars to get the room I originally paid for. Plus all the extra's, parking lot charge me 3 dollars a day and couldn't even get a parking place to park my car, parked at a friends 3 blocks away. Really???? So I need a contact number because this is just the start...

Reviews.Title: “makeover”
Reviews.Author: sonny61
Reviews.Content: The motel is in serious need of a makeover, it is old and run down, perfect location shame its wasted. Watch for hidden charges of parking your vehicle on the premises $3 a day what a joke. However is was not expensive to stay compared to others. I have stayed in cheaper motels and got much much more. Make sure you price compare, before you pay. However they will match any latest specials if u ask. We had a beach side room, windows so dirty what a waste of extra premium,

Reviews.Title: “Staff made the stay worth while.”
Reviews.Author: dva19926
Reviews.Content: We stayed June 3-4. Used a coupon from hotel coupon book so we got an excellant rate! The hotel is old so some of the visual aspects leave a little to be desired however, the rooms were clean, bed was comfortable, no smells, no bugs, felt safe. The staff was awesome. Front desk service (John Harris) was friendly, pleasant, very helpful, and very professional. If you are looking for a resort or luxury this is not for you. If you are looking for an economical weekend or week at the beach this is your place. We will return.

Reviews.Title: “Get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: KentuckyPuddin
Reviews.Content: Its a spring break hotel. It does need alot of updating and upgrading, but for the price its ok. Although they didnt vacuum the floor, make our bed in the 5 days we were there, they did give clean towels everyday.The water in the shower was hot and Carla at the front desk was very nice. If you want luxury this is not your place. If your a college kid on spring break, its for you!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not as bad as it seems”
Reviews.Author: James M
Reviews.Content: I went down for spring break with a bunch of guys from school. The place does not look as appealing one would hope, but it actually wasn't that bad given the circumstances. It was near a bunch of bars and strip clubs, you had to be extremely obnoxious to get on the staff's bad side, it was right on the beach, and it was very cheap which is probably the only reason you're considering it at the moment. I'd say its room conditions are worth the price and you're getting a deal when you add in the environmental perks.

Reviews.Title: “friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: clpdusty
Reviews.Content: the lady at the front desk was very friendly, Shari, she was very helpful and seemed to care about our needs. That's really the best I can say about this hotel, it is run down and needs alot of work,but, the location is great and the staff is friendly

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: William D
Reviews.Content: Upon first arrival, we were greeted by a very friendly front desk receptionist, Shari, and she took very good care of us. She upgraded our room from a double to a king size bed for no extra charge, and it was still a beachfront room. However, once we got to our room everything went south. Furthermore, there was not enough parking for everyone in the hotel. The bathroom was less than par with poor water pressure. The room itself just seemed dirty, one night we even found a bug in our bed, that was already dead, which said to us that the room hadn't been cleaned in some time. Another time, we found a dead bug on the windowsill in the bathroom, and again....how do you miss a dead bug when cleaning? The appliances were also very outdated and were stained and didn't seem safe to even use. There were very little plugs in the room and the plug in the bathroom did not seem to be up to code at all...it was practically falling out of the wall. The only thing that saved the room was the fact that we had an awesome view from our room; it was beachfront with our own private balcony.

Reviews.Title: “This might be the worst hotel in Florida!!!”
Reviews.Author: NeilSFlorida
Reviews.Content: When I read the reviews for this hole, I saw the bad ones, but there were some good ones as well. I decided to test my luck, and try it for myself because Daytona has a lot of old hotels that need updating, but at least they are clean. That is not the case with this one! This place is disgusting. There were holes on the bed boards, what looks like blood stuns on the filthy carpet, and a bad case of mold. The stairway is rusty and dark. The halllway to the room is just as dark with stains all over the carpet. The room has 2 doors. The front door is in the dark hallway. The other is to the outside. The outside door is rotting. I do have 1 positive thing to say. The water pressure in the shower was good. Believe the bad reviews. This place doesn't need to be renovated. It needs to be bulldozed!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: crl06270
Reviews.Content: My friends and I decided to stay there for spring break. We had looked online and came to found out that the place looked nice ( they obviously set up a room for display) when we arrive at the hotel we new this place was a horrible hotel. The doors didn't lock right, the carpet was dirty and filthy. My friends and I noticed a big blob of blood on he carpet. The towels in the bathroom were yellow, the bathroom didn't look like it had been clean in awhile nor did the room itself! I recommend not to stay here! It's may have a good price tag on it with staying rigt by the beach, but it's very dirty and unsafe! And the people at the desk were very rude and didn't consider thier visitors needs!

Reviews.Title: “A Happy Canadian”
Reviews.Author: Donald D
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel for the last 10 years,and for the location and rates, find it unbeatable. The staff of Lira,Shari,Carla and John are friendly and always helpful.Housekeeping people like Mary and maintainence people like Juan are great,and do a good job. The rooms are clean,but do need carpeting. I understand renovations are starting in the near future.This is not a 4 star hotel at 200 a night. For the price, it's great. People that want perfect, pay 200 + per night.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty used needle with unknown substance found in room”
Reviews.Author: lchaney80
Reviews.Content: Booked this motel on line, for 7nights due to pet friendly policy. This is the nastiest place I have seen. After 11 hours in the car with our 2 very well behaved cats, we opened the door to our room. The ceiling light did not work, the fan in the kitchen and bathroom didn't work. These things I overlooked as we were tired and just wanted to get settled in. Upon further inspection we noticed paint chipping off the walls, terrible black stains on the carpet, draperies dirty and torn. We decided we would make the best of it, at least it was on the beach. Then . . . My cat batted out something from under the dresser and began playing with it. It was a dirty used needle with something still in it. Took me 4 times to the lobby over 3 days to get to speak to the manager. This place needs to be shut down BIG TIME!!!! DO NOT STAY HERE! !!!!

Reviews.Title: “Most Disgusting Hotel I have ever seen in my life”
Reviews.Author: MariaB1203
Reviews.Content: My husband and I booked this hotel for one night on our drive down to Florida. The pictures online are VERY deceiving. Upon check-in, we were notified that there would be a daily charge for parking. Perhaps this is something that should have been mentioned prior to booking. I believe that it is disgraceful to charge your guests for parking at a hotel that they are already paying for. We were expecting to have a nice, oceanview room (which by the way did not come cheap- we paid $100 for the night). We got a room on the top floor, which was a hassle because we had to carry all of our luggage up the narrow stairs, since the elevator looked like something that was build in the 1920's. We walked down a dark hallway to our room, and once we walked in, we were it total disbelief. The room was the dirtiest, most disgusting room we had ever seen. The walls (which were supposed to be white) we covered in filth and peeling, the carpet was so dirty that I would never dare walk on it barefoot, the beds were covered in filth and had cigarette burns in them, and not to mention BED BUGS. Along with the bed bugs, there were all other sorts of bugs walking around on the walls, and to top it all off, the door did not lock. It looked like what I would imagine a Crack House to look like. My husband and I decided that we just couldn't stay in there another minute. We left our luggage in the room, along with some papers and pocket change that my husband threw on the bed. We left the hotel and went in search of another one, which wouldn't be as disgusting. I felt like I was on an episode of Cops with all the drug addicts walking around begging us for money and drugs. I seriously thought we were going to get shot in that hotel. We went just a few hotels down to the Holiday Inn (which was gorgeous and I would highly reccommend), and booked another room there (we ended up spending an additional $139 for our stay there). Had we known that the Conch House was going to be so disgusting, we would have just booked the Holiday Inn in the first place for the extra $39. We quickly went back to our room at the Conch House to get our luggage and pack it back into the car, and when we walked into our room, the lights did not work. We got our bags, and when we went to take the papers and money off of the bed, all of the money was missing. We went to the front desk, and told the man that we just could not bare to stay there any longer. His response was "Ok, well you know you are going to get charged for this anyway." This is disgusting and unprofessional. He did not even care to know why we were leaving or even try to entertain us by asking us what could have been done to make our stay better (which a professional would have done). I am positive that this hotel is a health hazard and must be in violation of many health codes. The Department of Health should be notified and this hotel should be shut down. Please do NOT believe what you see online and do yourself a big favor and book a different hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “Dated, dirty, and dismal”
Reviews.Author: rosebrien
Reviews.Content: To say this hotel is in need of some TLC would be like saying a person suffering a gunshot wound could use a couple of aspirin. Booked late for a trip to the 24 Hours of Daytona, chose it because of availability and price....i now know why it was cheap and available.....honestly, I can't think of any possible way to recommend this hotel, except maybe location. It's on the beach, close to Oceanwalk amenities, but you might be better off sleeping in your car in the pay garage across from the Hilton. I've stayed in some sketchy properties before, but this is memorable for just how rundown it is. A shame, actually, given the location, but as it is, avoid it regardless of the price.

Reviews.Title: “BED BUGS AND COCKROACHES”
Reviews.Author: dawn n
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for a few days during the off season and then on our last night we pulled back the sheets only to see a bed bug. The front desk then switched us to another room and there was a cockroach on the wall. We immediately left the hotel and would never stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “very very dirty”
Reviews.Author: Victor H
Reviews.Content: We went there for one night and couldn't stay there for longer. When we arrived at the hotel the front desk was nice, but they just didnt know what they were doing. They gave us the wrong password for internet and they didn't even realize it until someone came from the back room and correct them...it took more than 30 mins. The room was smelling like bleach and the room was very dirty as there were sand everywhere. there were blood in the toilet and there's no extraction in the bathroom so it was really hard to breath when you are taking a hot bath or shower. Though, the location is really nice. close to everywhere you need to go. and just a few steps from the beach. very basic place...if you have low budget that mind not be a bad choice. fyi, the internet is very very slow....you can barely use it. so I would they there's no internet.

Reviews.Title: “"Its worth how much it costs"”
Reviews.Author: JessNess2010
Reviews.Content: I went there bout a yr ago with my boyfriends parents for the Bethune Cookman homecoming. The front desk was area was nice and welcoming and so was the lady who greeted us but the room....whole different story. Tub had brown rust stains, the room had a funny smell, the tv had the staticy noise every time you'd turn it on and the lights were dim all the time. But we were 5secs from the beach which was a plus. But one last thing i hated was the noise of the planes and the drunk teenagers, couldnt rest at all. So an ok hotel for the price.

Reviews.Title: “VERY PEACEFUL PLACE TO STAY.”
Reviews.Author: MALCOLMSMOMLuray_va_
Reviews.Content: i enjoyed my couple of days here at this motel. the rooms were very pretty and loved the huge pool. the staff was very kind and helpful to me. very nice motel.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasent holiday”
Reviews.Author: David S
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel is excellent, the beach is on your doorstep, so are various clubs, bars and eating establishments. During Biketoberfest you do not have far to get to Main St. where much of the action happens. I agree with other people that the room I stayed in and hotel is a little tired, but that is far outweighed by the cleanliness and excellent room service. The staff are very accomodating to all my needs.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for - old but clean & cheap - close to boardwalk”
Reviews.Author: Amanda S
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at the Conch House about 6 times in the last 5 years. I stay here because it is cheap and within walking distance to the boardwalk (about 1/2 mile). The rooms are old and outdated but always clean. The outside of the building leaves a lot to be desired, but you don't spend time at the property much anyways when in Daytona. If you plan on spending any time in your room pay a little extra for an ocean view/ocean front room, the parking lot view isn't exactly scenic. I've encountered staff there that is freindly and helpful as well as staff that is uselss and dumber than a bag of rocks. On one stay a few years ago I asked the girl at the front desk where a good place to order pizza from out be. She simply told me she had no idea, couldn't even spit out a number for Pizza Hut. Great place to stay if you want a clean, close to attractions place to sleep, not the resort you want to spend all day at, though.

Reviews.Title: “Repeat Visitors And Love It! No Complaints At All”
Reviews.Author: Sean32127
Reviews.Content: We have been staying here for the last two weeks or so and have yet to encounter any of these horrible unpleasantries that everyone else is ranting and raving about. Sure, the hotel shows a bit of age but the service is outstanding and for the value, you cannot beat it. The AC blows ice cold, towels and other toiletries are available upon request and best of all, they're pet friendly. The pool is well-kept and beach access is a few steps from our room. The staff is super friendly and will go above and beyond to make sure you have a pleasant and enjoyable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Still a good deal; repeat customers”
Reviews.Author: brylo2Wisconsin
Reviews.Content: This is my second review. Stayed in room 327....had fresh paint, cold AC and all the rooms seemed to be getting new doors to the balconies. Having stayed two years in a row we feel no need to go anywhere else. There are places charging well over 200 a night and there isn't even a balcony! We like to sit outside and see what we came for...the beach. We have been in a high rise...spent more time waiting for an elevator to get to the beach. If you forget something even more time is wasted just getting back to your room and back down again. Nothing better for the price and location...located just a few blocks from the boardwalk.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great time!”
Reviews.Author: Phunkydiosa
Reviews.Content: We were looking to have a great anniversary on a slim budget. This place was perfect. We had an oceanview room with a balcony. We had a fridge so we could come in and enjoy our cold sodas. We were nervous from reviews, but didn't encounter anything that made us regret our stay. It was an easy walking distance from a theater, we were right on the beach. We would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “FABULOUS STAY, GREAT FOLKS!”
Reviews.Author: ftvalleyman
Reviews.Content: We stayed 4 nights, Thursday thru Sunday and checked out on Monday. We enjoyed our stay tremendously! The room was GREAT for the price and the service was EXCELLENT! The desk folks, Teresa, Lira and Jennifer, were wonderful! For the money, this BEACH FRONT motel is ACES in every respect! We DEFINITELY will stay here again and again!

Reviews.Title: “MOTEL from WRONG TURN MOVIE”
Reviews.Author: ladibug13
Reviews.Content: Oh my gosh ~ Where do I even begin...We arrive there and had reservations for BEACH FRONT...our room was BEACH VIEW. They put us on the THIRD floor but don't bother to tell you that their ELEVATOR hasn't worked FOREVER so we are trying to carry all our belongings up a very narrow stairwell THREE FLOORS up to what looks like a CRACK HOUSE RENOVATED MOTEL! The carpet in the hallway is DISGUISTING and SMELLED like MOLD. We get into the room and the door on the fridge falls off when we open it so you have to make sure you put the door on correctly when shuting it. The baloncy is big enough to hold ONE PERSON and a chair. After settling in the room we head to the beach and when it starts to storm everyone heads to the unvacuumed pool and LOW class individuals that made you feel like you were starring in the movie "WRONG TURN" . Let's just put it this way ~ When we locked our doors at night, we didn't open for ANYONE! The parking there SUCKED ~ You had to pay daily to park your car and didn't even have enough parking spaces for you to park sometimes so then you had to park across the BUSY highway down the road. We were so unhappy with everything we ended up checking out a day early just to get the heck out of there ~ Just remember...when looking for a motel....DO NOT GO BY the pictures on the INTERNET...False advertising!

Reviews.Title: “We hated it and will never again stay at this hotel”
Reviews.Author: bravomarlana
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night and it was terrible the floors have stains on them. We paid to park and then we had to park two blocks away because there was nowhere to park, this hotel sucks, when we walked outside of our room it smelled like someone was smoking. I will never recommend this hotel to anyone.This hotel put us on the 2nd floor knowing that my mom is handicape and can't walk up and down the stairs.

Reviews.Title: “aweful”
Reviews.Author: jamillahp
Reviews.Content: the rooms were dirty, the air condtion were coming off, the phone didnt work, the curtion were rip. I got my deal through priceline and they charged me another price. there were no ice bucket in the room, and, you had to take towels back to the front counter just to get others(which werenot white.. The pool had sand at the bottom of of it and the water tasted like sea water... there were a homeless man sleeping onthe property..The young lady in the evening were rude.. There is no elevators... Overall it look like a prison camp. old and dirty.

Reviews.Title: “Never stay here its horrible”
Reviews.Author: wiloxfamily
Reviews.Content: Never stay here there are red and black stains on the floor it is like a twilight zone the stairs are unstable needs to be inspected to be shut down and needs to be sued for not answering customer service the conch hotel is not a place for no one I rather stayed in the hilton its way nicer and they treat the customers write.never stay at the conch hotel

Reviews.Title: “ThE nastiest hotel in the world they should shut it down”
Reviews.Author: wiloxfamily
Reviews.Content: Horrible I hate it so nasty dirty floors lock doent work smells like smoke nast

Reviews.Title: “Describing this motel as shabby is being kind.”
Reviews.Author: chapmanfamily3
Reviews.Content: Booked the Conch House Motel 4/4 - 4/9 2011. The motel is so run down. Walking up the stairs is only the start to a horror movie. This was to be a one bedroom suite. There was no door between the two rooms. Only one room had a TV in it. The closet had no hangers or doors. During the night the bathroom mirror slid off the wall. The carpet, chairs and edge of the bathroom floor were filthy. Light switch plates had chunks missing from them; the carpet trim was peeling from the walls and everything else was shabby. There was a piece of cake on the ceiling. People were checking into the motel with some leaving immediately and others staying one night and saying they would be gone the next day. Homeless people stay at this motel when they have funds. There was a lady who walked the street during the day with her suitcase and stayed there at night. We stayed in the ocean view suite on the 3rd floor. There were two beds that were in decent shape and one that was sunken in. The ocean view was spectacular. The other positive was the fridge/freezer combination was not the college dorm size, but a little larger. Staff was also nice.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for price paid”
Reviews.Author: pgcjr57
Reviews.Content: Service was abouve par----room was average,to good considering right on beach (if your looking for spotless don't stay on the beach)---location couldn't be better --- loved that could walk out of room to the pool & the beach

Reviews.Title: “Don't do it!!!”
Reviews.Author: anhellica1979
Reviews.Content: My fault for not reading the reviews first. #1-The check-in lady was more concerned with the Chinese take out than paying attention to us. #2-Sketchy people around!! Guys hanging out in the parking lot asking for some sort of "business." #3-Rooms are FILTHY! I didn't want to touch anything. Trash behind the furniture. Clump of hair in the bedsheets. #4-Noise was horrible! I get that it's Spring Break, but I heard everything in the parking lot, in the hall, and down the street. #5-Parking is very limited. Didn't feel the car was safe. The kicker is that the location is next to the Plaza and a couple of other great hotels. Location alone is great, very central. Walking distance to the boardwalk & shops. But the quality of the place is NOT worth the money I paid. Stay far far away!! I agree with the person below that said it needs to be demolished pronto.

Reviews.Title: “EBONY IS TOPS!!!!”
Reviews.Author: bruno1478
Reviews.Content: My wife, sons, and I stayed last year and it was our best beach experience ever. The rooms were not the ritz carlton, but its a small beachfront hotel catered to a tigh budget. Ebony the desk clerk was the greatest. We are going again this year and look forward to the stay. Being on a drug metro task force in my home state, I got no weird feelings walking to our room. Hey guys it's Daytona...Party and get over it..lol

Reviews.Title: “WORST EVER!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: daytona500_11
Reviews.Content: This was the nastiest place ever. There were dead roaches in the floor. Rust everywhere. Room we had looked as if it had been broken into before. TRULY NOT WHAT IS DESCRIBED!!!!! I would never take children here. We felt like we were going to be muggged walking down the ally to get to the hotel from parking lot. TERRIBLE!!!! Should be condemned!!!!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel should be demolished by the Florida Department of Health immediately”
Reviews.Author: shaningreenville
Reviews.Content: I have NEVER in my life had a more horrifying hotel experience than I did at the Conch House Hotel. It is filthy. FILTHY. It smells. BAD. Surfaces are dirty in the bathroom. There is hair in the bathtub and on the counter and residue of some sort on the toilet seat. The towels are thin and stained (and don't bother asking for more- they don't have any). The bedspreads are also stained and dirty. There appeared to be boogers on the headboard along with what looked like dried marinara sauce. I can't believe this had not been cleaned. There were roaches in the hotel - I pray there were no bed bugs- if so, I now have them in my house. I was afraid to touch the mattress to check. I was literally afraid to take off my socks and touch the floor. The hotel was loud, there were several sketchy people hanging out on the premises (I think I witnessed a drug deal). I know I saw prostitutes on the property twice in two days - I would be offended if I were a prostitute and someone took me to this place- what a lack of respect. The worst part is that I couldn't move to another hotel as I was with a group and everything else was booked. I have learned a valuable lesson - I will NEVER stay in a hotel without checking for negative reviews - this place should be closed. The photograph online makes is look presentable- this is FALSE ADVERTISING and should be ILLEGAL. I am suspicious of any review of this place that is not negative- I feel certain those come from someone with financial interests in this hotel. Even the most skanky of human beings has to know that this is extreme filth.

HotelInfo.Name: Conch House
HotelInfo.Address: 700 N Atlantic Ave, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
